jobs.title: Festeinstieg im Sales Development (SDR) bei Bliro (m/w/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Über Bliro

Bei Bliro revolutionieren wir den Arbeitsalltag von Kundenteams mithilfe von KI. Unsere Plattform transkribiert und analysiert Kundengespräche in Echtzeit – egal ob online oder vor Ort. So können Teams weltweit datenbasierte Entscheidungen treffen und ihre Prozesse automatisieren. Wir fokussieren uns auf Millionen von Vertriebsusern - 2.5 Millionen allein in Deutschland. Wer mit uns arbeitet, prägt die nächste Generation intelligenter Zusammenarbeit zwischen Mensch und KI.

Schon heute vertrauen über 1.500 Unternehmen auf Bliro – darunter schnell wachsende Start-ups und etablierte Corporates. Unterstützt von Top-Investoren, suchen wir nun dich als neues Vollzeitmitglied im Bereich Sales Development (SDR), um unser Wachstum weiter voranzutreiben.

Unser Sales Team bringt Erfahrung aus den schnellstwachsenden Software Unternehmen der Welt mit (Ex-Deel, Ex-Autodesk, Ex-Celonis) und freut sich auf deine Bewerbung!

🎯 Deine Aufgaben

Als Teil unseres Go-to-Market-Teams bist du ganz vorne mit dabei – du baust gemeinsam mit uns die Vertriebskanäle von morgen.

1. Du bist unsere erste Kontaktperson für potenzielle Kunden

  • Du identifizierst und recherchierst potenzielle Kunden und Zielgruppen.

  • Du führst erste Gespräche mit Leads und erklärst ihnen den Mehrwert unserer Lösung.

  • Du nutzt E-Mail, LinkedIn und andere Kanäle zur Kontaktaufnahme.

2. Du entwickelst unsere Vertriebsprozesse mit

  • Du testest verschiedene Outreach-Strategien und analysierst, was funktioniert.

  • Du arbeitest eng mit dem Account Executive Team und dem Marketing zusammen, um Leads effektiv weiterzuentwickeln.

  • Du bringst eigene Ideen ein, wie wir unsere Pipeline effizienter gestalten können.

3. Du lernst, wächst und entwickelst dich weiter

  • Du erhältst wöchentliches Coaching und ehrliches Feedback.

  • Du bekommst tiefe Einblicke in moderne B2B SaaS Vertriebsprozesse.

  • Du baust dir ein starkes Skillset auf, das dich optimal für den Berufseinstieg vorbereitet – ideal auch als Sprungbrett für eine Junior AE Rolle.

🧠 Dein Profil

Wir suchen keine fertigen Profis – wir suchen echte Macher:innen mit Leidenschaft und Neugier.

Was du mitbringen solltest:

  • Interesse an Sales, Start-ups und Technologie

  • Kommunikationsstärke, Eigeninitiative und Teamgeist

  • Spaß am Umgang mit Menschen – egal ob im Call oder schriftlich

  • Sehr gute Deutschkenntnisse (C2) und gute Englischkenntnisse (mind. C1)

Von Vorteil, aber kein Muss:

  • Erste Erfahrung im Outbound-Vertrieb (z. B. Praktika, Werkstudentenjob, Nebenjob)

  • Erfahrung mit Tools wie Hubspot, LinkedIn Sales Navigator oder LaGrowthMachine

💡 Warum Bliro

📊 Sei Teil der AI-Revolution!
Bei Bliro bauen wir nicht nur ein Tool – wir definieren, wie Unternehmen mit ihren Kunden kommunizieren, komplett neu. Mit modernster KI machen wir Sales-Teams schlauer, Meetings produktiver und Notizen überflüssig. Klingt nach Zukunft? Ist es auch. Und du kannst sie mitgestalten.

🌍 Globaler Vibe trifft Münchner Charme
Unser Team besteht aus knapp 20 smarten Köpfen aus neun verschiedenen Ländern. Bei uns triffst du auf Kreativität und Internationalität. Du arbeitest mit Menschen, die mitdenken, mitlachen und mit dir wachsen wollen.

🧑‍💻 Flexibel wie ein Schweizer Taschenmesser
9 to 5 ist nicht dein Ding? Kein Problem. Ob vom Küchentisch, aus dem Office oder der Dachterrasse – bei uns zählt das Ergebnis, nicht der Aufenthaltsort. Und ja, auch Pyjamahosen sind im Homeoffice offiziell erlaubt.

🥳 Teamspirit, der wirklich Spaß macht
Wir lieben Sales, aber wir feiern auch: bei legendären Offsites, spontanen Lunches oder gemeinsamen Coffee Breaks. Und wer weiß – vielleicht triffst du dein Team bald beim Tischtennis-Turnier oder beim Afterwork-Bier wieder.

💸 Faire Vergütung + Extras, die sich sehen lassen können
Du bekommst ein faires Gehalt, Bonus-Möglichkeiten und Zugriff auf Ressourcen, die dich wirklich weiterbringen. Learning Budget? Haben wir. Sales-Library? Klar. Persönliches Coaching? Auch dabei.

🧑‍🤝‍🧑 You'll never pitch alone
Dein Start bei Bliro wird begleitet von einem Buddy, der dich einführt, auffängt und mit Memes versorgt. Wir sind Teamplayer – von Tag eins bis zur ersten erfolgreichen Demo (und darüber hinaus).

Du hast Lust, den Vertrieb eines KI-Startups von Grund auf mitzuerleben und mitzugestalten? Dann bewirb dich jetzt!

Let’s build the future of Sales – together. 💥

jobs.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer (f/m/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Bliro, we’re building the privacy-first, autonomous CRM system for enterprise revenue teams. With deep technical ambition and design precision, we’re changing how businesses capture, analyze, and act on customer touchpoints.

We’re expanding our elite founding team with a Senior Full-Stack Engineer who brings breadth across modern web and backend technologies — enabling us to push Bliro to new heights.

Your Opportunity

As a Senior Full-Stack Engineer, you will contribute to major product surfaces across our web app, desktop client, iOS app and backend services.

Take technical ownership of one platform, shaping how we ship performant, low-latency real-time features.

Work closely with our CTO and founding engineers and drive our technical strategy by architecting scalable services, defining best practices across the stack and informing product and infrastructure decisions.

Coach junior engineers, guide code reviews, and help grow a high-performing engineering culture where learning and ownership are core.

Help us build a robust delivery pipeline that balances product velocity with reliability and quality.

What You Bring

We value technical excellence, ownership mindset, and the ability to move fluidly between execution and leadership. We’re looking for:

Must-Have Competencies

  • University degree in Math, Informatics or an adjacent technical subject

  • Previous experience in a startup as technical lead or CTO

  • Expertise in TypeScript, React, Node.js, and modern full-stack development

  • Familiarity in either Swift or C++

Bonus Points

  • Contributions to open-source or personal side projects you’re proud of

  • Familiarity with privacy-focused architectures or real-time data pipelines

  • Exposure to audio, voice, or AI technologies

Why This Role Is Unique

Work with exceptional engineers

Join Bliro's technical team which consists of exceptional engineers like long year industry experts, former CTOs and PhD candidates from top universities. We foster a culture of support, learning and execution to build something fairly exceptional.

Impact the lives of thousands

Your work won’t be sandboxed — every line of code impacts real users and real businesses. You will take ownership over features and products and you’ll have the chance to grow into a tech lead or principal role quickly as we scale.

Enjoy a unique company culture

At Bliro we are forming a team of fast-thinking and highly skilled individuals who deserve full support from their employer. We will cover your back so that you don't need to worry about anything but to build amazing products with an amazing team. Therefore we offer:

  • Early-team equity, meaningful ownership and a competitive salary

  • A basis in Munich paired with a flexible hybrid setup

  • Latest tech equipment you'll enjoy working with

  • Food and Drink flatrate in the office

  • A front-row seat in one of Europe’s most exciting AI startups

  • Backing from world-class investors

jobs.title: Associate Founding Engineer (Full-Stack) (f/m/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
At Bliro, we’re building the privacy-first, autonomous CRM system for enterprise revenue teams. With deep technical ambition and design precision, we’re changing how businesses capture, analyze, and act on customer touchpoints.

This is not your average entry-level engineering role. You’ll work side-by-side with our CTO and three very experienced Founding Engineers, contributing across web, desktop, and mobile applications — and learning what it takes to build a world-class product from the ground up.

Your Opportunity

As our Associate Founding Engineer, you will:

  • Support and Learn: Act as the technical right-hand to our founding engineers. Absorb best practices in full-stack development, system design, cloud infrastructure, and agile product development.

  • Build Across the Stack: Contribute to core features across our React Web App, Electron Desktop Client, Swift Mobile App, and two backend services.

  • Accelerate Your Growth: Get direct mentorship from senior technical leaders who’ve built systems used by millions. We’ll invest in your learning, not just your output.

  • Shape the Product: Be involved in product discussions early. Learn how technical decisions align with user value and business strategy.

We care less about years of experience and more about curiosity, drive, and readiness to grow. Ideally, you bring:

Must-Have Competencies

  • University degree in Math, Informatics or any adjacent subject

  • Solid foundation in TypeScript and modern React

  • A growth mindset with demonstrated ability to learn fast and ship reliably

  • Demonstratable experience in one or more of: mobile (Swift), desktop (Electron/React), or Web (React/Node.js, REST/WebSockets)

  • Enthusiasm for working in a fast-paced, early-stage environment

jobs.title: Founder's Associate Intern - Product (f/m/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Shadow the CTO. Build real things. Move fast. Learn everything.

You’re smart and fast?

This is your shot.

At Bliro, we’re not just building a product—we’re building a category-defining company in the AI space. Our platform helps customer-facing teams capture and analyze every interaction to make smarter decisions, automate follow-ups, and close more deals.

Thousands of users already rely on Bliro every day. We’re backed by top European VCs and scaling fast.

Now, we’re looking for an ambitious Founder’s Associate Intern to join the rocket ship.

What’s the Role?

You’ll work directly with our Product Co-Founder and shadow the life of a startup executive. One day you might be setting up analytics. The next, solving a critical customer integration. The next, shaping our product roadmap or shipping a dev tool that 10x’s our team.

This is not a typical internship. You’ll own real problems, work across the stack, and gain exposure to everything from product to infrastructure to investor discussions.

We’re looking for builders, not spectators.

What You’ll Be Doing

  • Build Internal Tools: Introduce tooling, setup processes, create dashboards, CLI tools, Slack bots or whatever helps us move faster.

  • Automate Everything: From product to dev workflows—if it’s manual, it’s your target.

  • Support the Founder: Support the founder in high-stake meetings, projects and initiatives.

Who You Are

  • You love building. You’ve shipped projects for fun, school, or startups—and want more.

  • You’re fast and resourceful. You figure things out and don’t wait for instructions.

  • You have a founder mindset: You care about the whole company, not just your tasks.

Your Background

  • Studying or recently finished CS, Engineering, or Business Informatics or any adjacent subject

  • A fast learner with an analytical and logic oriented mindset

  • Fluent in English

  • Bonus: You’ve worked at a startup, built your own projects, or explored AI tools

What You’ll Get

  • Direct mentorship from our CTO and exposure to real startup decisions

  • High speed, high trust environment—your work matters

  • Steep learning curve across product and operations

  • Full ownership of projects with visible impact

This is for you if…

You’re looking for a launchpad that you will proud of on your CV.

You want to get your hands dirty, build fast, and be part of something big from the start.

You’re hungry to learn, ready to own, and not afraid to fail forward.

Join us and build the future. Let’s make something people can’t live without.

jobs.title: Founder's Associate Intern (f/m/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
You want to..

  • join a scaling Start-Up in the heart of Europe?

  • create a category defining company?

  • build something people really want?

Then this is for you! 🫵

We’re building an AI platform for customer facing teams that transcribes and analyses all customer touchpoints—both online and in person. Today, thousands of people at over 1,000 companies around the world use Bliro every day to collect, analyse and automate based on data from customer conversations.

We have just raised a Seed Round from some of the best European VCs out there and are looking for you to join us for the ride!

❓About the Role

As a Founder’s Associate at Bliro, you’ll work directly with our founders Martin and Maurice to make sure we reach our rapid growth targets. This is a high-impact, hands-on role where you will both work strategically and execute on a daily basis: support with customer onboardings and AI customisation projects, drive strategic operative projects, help with product management and more - whatever is needed to bring Bliro to the next level.

This role requires a high degree of trust and offers significant growth opportunities, including the potential to lead your own team in the near future. Your contributions will have a direct impact on the company's success.

🧑‍💻Your Key Responsibilities

Your responsibilities may vary based on the situation and - among others - might include:

  • Drive Strategic Projects: Experience what it is like to lead a fast growing AI company by supporting the founding team on all kinds of strategic projects: from product to sales and operations.

  • Support with customer onboardings and AI customisation projects: We are onboarding large customers on a weekly basis. Work with customers and users and help them make the most of Bliro.

  • Help defining and setting up operations: The company is growing rapidly: Help set up processes and tools, professionalise our reporting structures and keep investors and customers in the loop.

🔨 Your Skills & Competencies

  • Strong product sense and customer obsession
    Bliro is all about creating a product, that our customers love. We expect you to have a strong product sense and obsession over our customer's needs.

  • Technical Generalist
    You can dive into problems of all kinds but are also not afraid to build and maintain complex excel sheets or automation workflows in Zapier / Make.

  • Project Management & Organization
    You can manage multiple priorities simultaneously, ensuring tasks are completed on time and to a very high standard.

  • Adaptability & Continuous Improvement
    You have a proactive mindset and have shown that you want to constantly improve the Status Quo.

📃 Your Profile

  • Language Proficiency: Fluent in German and English.

  • Education: Studying or holding a degree in Industrial Engineering, Business, Business Informatics, or a similar field.

  • Technical Skills: Proficient with Excel and no-code tools like Zapier and Make; some coding knowledge is a strong plus.

  • Experience: Prior experience in high-growth startups or consulting is a strong plus.

  • Mindset: Detail-oriented, highly organized, and eager to take on diverse challenges in a fast-paced environment.

🧙 Why Join Us?

  • Work directly with the founders and make a tangible impact on Bliro’s growth and success.

  • Steep learning curve, ownership and responsibility from day 1.

  • Be part of a fast-paced, high-growth environment with opportunities for learning and career development.

jobs.title: Account Executive (m/f/d)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Bliro

At Bliro, we’re revolutionizing the way customer-facing teams work with AI. Our platform transcribes and analyzes customer conversations in real-time - whether online or in-person. This empowers teams worldwide to make data-driven decisions and automate workflows.

We focus on millions of sales professionals—2.5 million in Germany alone. By joining us, you’ll help shape the next generation of intelligent collaboration between humans and AI.

Already, over 1,500 companies trust Bliro—including fast-growing startups and established corporates. Backed by top-tier investors, we’re now looking for a full-time Account Executive (AE) to drive our next phase of growth.

Our Sales team brings experience from some of the world’s fastest-scaling software companies (Ex-Deel, Ex-Autodesk, Ex-Celonis)—and they’re excited to welcome you aboard!

🎯 Your Responsibilities

As an Account Executive at Bliro, you’ll own the entire sales cycle - from demo to close. You’ll work hand-in-hand with our SDR team, who will ensure your calendar is packed with qualified demos, so you can focus on what you do best: closing high-value deals.

  1. Run and Win the Sales Process

  • Lead discovery calls and tailored product demos with mid-market and enterprise prospects.

  • Build strong relationships with key stakeholders and decision-makers.

  • Manage complex sales cycles and negotiate contracts with ACVs of €50k+.

  1. Partner Across the Go-to-Market Team

  • Work closely with SDRs who book your meetings, ensuring smooth handoffs and tight collaboration.

  • Collaborate with Marketing and Product to refine messaging and continuously improve our sales playbook.

  • Share feedback from the field to help shape our roadmap.

  1. Exceed Quota and Drive Growth

  • Consistently close new business to hit - and exceed - your targets.

  • Develop and expand your pipeline within key verticals and geographies.

  • Position Bliro as a trusted partner to clients looking to transform their sales processes with AI.

🧠 Your Profile

We’re looking for driven AEs who are passionate about high-touch B2B SaaS sales and want to grow with a category-defining AI startup.

What you should bring:

  • Proven track record in closing mid-market or enterprise SaaS deals (ACVs €50k and higher).

  • Strong experience owning the full sales cycle—from first call to signed contract.

  • Excellent communication and relationship-building skills across multiple stakeholders.

  • High degree of self-motivation, accountability, and a team-first mindset.

  • Fluency in German (C2) and English (C1+).

💡 Why Bliro

📊 Be Part of the AI Revolution
We’re not just building a tool - we’re redefining how companies communicate with customers. With state-of-the-art AI, we make sales teams smarter, meetings more productive, and note-taking obsolete.

🌍 Global Vibe, Munich Base
We’re a 20-person team from 9 different countries. Expect creativity, internationality, and colleagues who grow, laugh, and win together.

🧑‍💻 Flexible Like a Swiss Army Knife
9-to-5 isn’t our style. Work from home, our office, or the rooftop terrace. We care about results - not where you sit. Pajama pants? Totally fine.

🥳 Team Spirit That’s Actually Fun
We celebrate wins and enjoy offsites, spontaneous lunches, coffee breaks, table tennis tournaments, and afterwork beers.

💸 Fair Compensation + Perks That Count
Competitive base salary, uncapped commission, and extras like a personal learning budget, access to our Sales library, and coaching that will level up your career.

🧑‍🤝‍🧑 You’ll Never Close Alone
From day one, you’ll be paired with a buddy and supported by a collaborative team.

👉 Ready to help us shape the future of Sales with AI? Apply now and let’s win together!

Let’s build the future of Sales – together. 💥
